items.content_html: This project is a lightweight, multi-page website framework built with Preact and preact-router. It provides a solid foundation for creating fast, efficient web applications with multiple routes, implements lazy loading for improved performance, and uses Webpack as the build tool.
items.title: jameswquinn/Preact-Multi-page-Website-Framework: This project is a lightweight, multi-page website framework built with Preact and preact-router. It provides a solid foundation for creating fast, efficient web applications with multiple routes, implements lazy loading for improved performance, and uses Webpack as the build tool.
